titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at White-hall, on Easter day the 16. of April. 1620. By the Bishop of Winchester
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Initial leaf contains signature-mark "A" with part of a woodcut frame.
Also issued as part 4 of the collection of sermons without general title page (STC 624.5) commencing with "The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie".
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
